original_text: assuming that you have heard of the stewardship of God's grace that was given to me for you,
korean_text: 너희를 위하여 내게 주신 하나님의 그 은혜의 경륜을 너희가 들었을 터이라

sentences.original_text: of the stewardship of God's grace
that was given to me for you
sentences.korean_translation: 그것이 너희를 위해 내게 주어진 것이라,
